translations: v．霸占，擅自占有：未经他人同意而擅自占有或控制他人的权利、财产等。
· He arrogated the right to make decisions.
他擅自占有了做决定的权利。

sentences.sentence: He arrogated the privilege to himself alone.
The assembly arrogated to itself the right to make changes.
sentences.translation: 议会攫取了进行修改的权利。

sentences.sentence: That firm arrogated itself the right to develop this area.
sentences.translation: 那家企业冒称有权开发这一地区。
